t: Shop Tufenkian Rugs | Extremely Handmade by Tufenkian
s: Tufenkian area rugs showcase superior craftsmanship and artistry. Made from the finest wool sourced from Tibetan highland and Great Caucasus Mountain sheep, these rugs sometimes incorporate top-quality silk to create fresh variations.

One of our most popular Armenian border rugs, the small scale detailing offers an exotic field with a subtle edge. Handcrafted in Armenia of fine wool. Light forest green graces the field in a way that resembles an aerial view of a stately garden, a carpet for distinguished interiors.

This brand is the 21st-century answer to ancient Oriental rugs. Each piece is knotted by highly skilled artisans using heirloom-quality materials. Tufenkian rugs are hand-knotted. It's the best way to make a rug but is also the hardest and by far the most time-consuming.
